title: Studies on Assortative Mating
description: Results from 457 studies on assortative mating in various species.
details: The 457 studies included in this dataset provide 1828 correlationcoefficients describing the similarity in some measure of bodysize in mating couples in 341 different species.
source: Rios Moura, R., Oliveira Gonzaga, M., Silva Pinto, N.,Vasconcellos-Neto, J., & Requena, G. S. (2021). Assortative matingin space and time: Patterns and biases. _Ecology Letters_,*24*(5), 1089-1102. https://doi.org/10.1111/ele.13690
